    • Field Detail

      • duration

        private SlideElementDuration duration

    • Constructor Detail

      • SlideImage

        public SlideImage(java.lang.String url,
          int x,
          int y,
          int width,
          int height,
          int startTime,
          int duration)
        The Full PWS Constructor for images. completely fulfills PWS Specification for images
        Parameters:
        url - The url of the image to be added
        x - The top left x coordinate of the bounding rectangle
        y - The top left y coordinate of the bounding rectangle
        width - The width the image should be shown with
        height - The height the image should be shown with
        startTime - The number of seconds before the image appears
        duration - The number of seconds the image appears for

    • Method Detail

        Fulfills ImageDurationTest

        Parameters:
        seconds - start delay in seconds

        Date Modified: 3 May 2014

        public void show()
